cards.description: [PASSIVE] This Champion takes 0 damage from Spells.
[TRIGGER] When this Champion takes damage from an opponent's Equipment: Deal 30 damage to the Champion that was equipped with that Equipment.
[TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: Add 1 'Ash of the Hearth' from Grave to Hand. [TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: you can Equip 1 'Fuel of the Hearth' to a Champion.
[TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: Add 1 'Fuel of the Hearth' from Grave to Hand. [TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: you can Equip 1 'Ash of the Hearth' to a Champion.
[TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: you can Destroy 1 'Piranha' you control then Deal 20 damage to a Champion. [TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: you can Add 1 'Piranha' from Grave to Hand.

[TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: you can Destroy 1 'Musky' you control then Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion. [TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: you can Add 1 'Musky' from Grave to Hand.
[ACTIVATED] If your opponent activated a spell last turn: you can Add 1 or more copies of that spell from your Deck or Grave to Hand then Destroy this card.
[TRIGGER] When this Champion is healed: Draw a card then Discard a card.
